title: Herbal Detox Tea
cleaned_text: Loose Leaf Herbal Tea This fascinating blend of fresh herbs helps promote the body's ability to detoxify itself. Burdock protects liver cells from damage while Milk thistle seed helps boost the liver function. For flavor and numerous other health benefits this 100% all natural herb blend also contains dandelion, cinnamon, ginger, lemongrass and licorice root. Do something nice for your insides.
